overview: From 2025-12-31 to 2026-01-01, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 2 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 3 active contributors.

topPRs.title: Remove l2oo support
topPRs.author: JoshdfG
topPRs.body:
<!--
Contributions welcome! See https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Description**

<!--
A clear and concise description of the features you're adding in this pull request.
-->

* **Deprioritized Legacy Proposals:** Fully removed `L2OutputOracle` logic from the proposer service.
* **Streamlined Driver:** Flattened the `sendTransaction` and `loop` logic, removing the `waitForL1Head` check and conditional branching.

* **Refactored Tests:** Updated `driver_test.go` and `config_test.go` to remove legacy test vectors and modernized mocks to support the unified DGF proposal path.


**Tests**

<!--
Please describe any tests you've added. If you've added no tests, or left important behavior untested, please explain why not.
-->

* All `op-proposer/proposer/...` tests pass with `go test -v`.

* Verified that the proposer correctly panics or errors if the required `DisputeGameFactory` address is missing, preventing misconfiguration.

**Metadata**

<!-- 
Include a link to any github issues that this may close in the following form:
- Fixes #[Link to Issue]
-->
* Fixes #18620

topPRs.title: feat: Set default respected game type to CANNON_KONA(#18640)
topPRs.author: JoshdfG
topPRs.body:
<!--
Contributions welcome! See https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Description**

This PR updates the default game types for `op-challenger` to prioritize `CANNON_KONA` as the primary game type. Following Upgrade 18, `CANNON_KONA` is now the preferred execution engine, while `CANNON` (op-program) remains as the secondary fallback option.

The following changes were made:

* Updated `GameTypesFlag` in `op-challenger/flags/flags.go` to reorder the default values, placing `cannon-kona` ahead of `cannon`.
* Verified that the `config` package correctly inherits and validates these defaults without requiring hardcoded logic changes.

<!--
A clear and concise description of the features you're adding in this pull request.
-->

**Tests**

<!--
Please describe any tests you've added. If you've added no tests, or left important behavior untested, please explain why not.
-->

1. **Manual Verification:** Built the `op-challenger` binary and verified the help text reflects the new default:
* Command: `./bin/op-challenger --help`
* Output: `--game-types value (default: "cannon-kona", "cannon")`

2. **Unit Tests:** Ran the existing test suite in `op-challenger/flags` to ensure environment variable binding and flag registration remain intact.

* Command:  cd into op-challenger and I ran `go test -v ./flags/...`

* Result: `PASS`

**Additional context**

<!--
Add any other context about the problem you're solving.
-->


**Metadata**
<!-- 
Include a link to any github issues that this may close in the following form:
- Fixes #[Link to Issue]
-->
* Fixes #18640
